{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Baton twirling {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Baton twirling Baton twirling is an art involving the manipulation of a metal rod and the performer's body to a coordinated routine. It is similar to rhythmic gymnastics or color guard. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baton twirling)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
